amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: State College Facilities Program; created; use of appropriations.
amendatorysection.para: The State College Facilities Program is created. All funds appropriated to the program by the Legislature shall be used exclusively for the projects listed in section 85-424 or for renewal, renovation, replacement, or repair projects authorized pursuant to section 85-424.
